name: Battlefield Mind Games
description: High-level psychological combat techniques for countering deception, intimidation, and manipulation in real-time.

cards.title: Detecting and Countering Intimidation Tactics
cards.description: Understanding and reversing psychological intimidation strategies.
cards.bulletpoints: Breaking Fear-Based Control, Recognizing Subconscious Threat Cues, Overriding Social Pressure

cards.title: Cold Reading and Information Extraction
cards.description: Analyzing microexpressions, speech patterns, and subconscious signals to extract intel.
cards.bulletpoints: Microexpression Analysis, Situational Intelligence Gathering, Strategic Questioning

cards.title: Disrupting Psychological Warfare Attacks
cards.description: Techniques for neutralizing gaslighting, manipulation, and social engineering in real time.
cards.bulletpoints: Cognitive Pattern Breakers, Instant Role Reversals, Conversational Redirection
